case.name: Traxon Industries Pty Ltd ACN 009 318 987 v Emerson Electric Co (No 2) [2006] FCA 630 (26 May 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: service of originating process out of jurisdiction
whether the proceeding is one to which federal court rules o 8 r 1 applies
claims based on misleading and deceptive conduct in australia in contravention of the trade practices act 1974 (cth)
breach in the united states of contract made in australia
breach of confidence and breach of fiduciary duty alleged to have occurred in the united states
whether causes of action must be wholly within one or more of the heads enumerated in rule 1
whether a prima facie case disclosed
proceeding not one to which o 8 r 1 applies
leave to amend statement of claim and to file further evidence
application to set aside service of originating process outside the jurisdiction
whether causes of action relied upon fall within the itemised cases contained in order 8 rule 1
whether it is necessary for an applicant to show a prima facie case on each cause of action relied upon
in relation to a claim under s.52 of the trade practices act 1974 , necessity to show that the respondent carries on business in australia.

JUDICIARY ACT 1903 - SECT 39B Original jurisdiction of Federal Court of Australia
